Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes

package it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AskServerData
    Scene to ask user IP and port of server to connect
    BasicDialog
    Class that contain some methods usefull for all Dialogs
    BasicSceneUpdater
    Class with all the common methods between scene controllers Its an Observer so whenever client modify the model this scene wil be notified Its an observable so whenever occure this class can notify controller
    BuyScene
    basicly the shop of cards inside game, allow to buy card and position them inside Dashboard
    DashboardScene
    Home page of game Rappresent the dashboard with all user resources and faith track, and cards Here user can navigate to Market,Shop,Spy and do whatever action he need in this turn
    DialogLeader
    ask user which leader he want he can also delete his action and do another one (drag & drop)
    DialogProductionScene
    Ask user where he want to put a buyed card
    EndGameScene
    Scene used to request server informartion
    HomeScene
    Home page with Login and reconnect buttons
    InitialResources
    ask user which resources he want from a list (drag & drop)
    LoginScene
    ask user nickname
    LorenzoDialog
    show lorenzo action during turns in single player
    MarketScene
    allow user to see market during other turn or execut extraction during his turn
    MoveScene
    ask how much res he want to move in a deposit
    PaymentDialog
    allow user to pay a debt by drag and drop resources from storage/chest to payment box
    ServerErrorController
    server disconnected scene (if server goes down)
    SpyScene
    set a different "userIndex" inside dashboard so you see others player data
    ToastController
    Fading message that disappear in some seconds
    WaitingStartScene
    scene to wait others player to login (when user stargame this scene disappear)
    YesNoDialog
    a simple dialog with yes or no dialog
